title: Bugsplatting when I try to launch the client?
body: I was having trouble patching and then the client was giving me the "unable to patch error.". I tried running as administrator to bypass the problem, but now instead of even trying to launch, it immediately bugsplats. Nothing pops up, nothing processes, just immediate bugsplat. Wish I could provide information, but it's that simple. Hoping for a solve that isn't straight up re-install, because that takes a while.

replies.body:
Most of the time an error while trying to patch can be traced back to some kind of permissions issue, but with that bugsplat happening it sounds like there might be some damaged files in your installation. 

Before we jump to a complete install, let's go through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to try and save you a little time and pain!
